power_consumption.description: Power consumption in Watts per hour for different runner types - value below are temporary

ubuntu.description: Standard 2-vCPU x86 Ubuntu VM, based on a D4as_v4

windows.description: Standard 2-vCPU x86 Windows VM (higher due to OS overhead)

grid_carbon_intensity.description: US average carbon intensity in grams CO2e per kWh, ElectricityMaps dataset 2024

pue.description: Power Usage Effectiveness - ratio of total data center power to IT equipment power. Accounts for cooling, power distribution, and other overhead
